sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import '../assets/styles/CareerBento.scss'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faPlus, faMinus, faRocket, faCode, faExternalLinkAlt } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const CareerBento = () => { const [expandedIndex, setExpandedIndex] = useState(0); const history = [ { org: "KLAW Industries", role: "Software Engineer Intern", period: "Aug 2024 — May 2025", location: "Binghamton, NY", logo: "https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/5cfee7779de45a000197fd31/1622649420794-QC687JBOL698CEBAZOTH/KLAW+Industries+Transparent.png", url: "https://www.klawindustries.com/", impact: "Reduced incident response time by 40% and built scalable video pipelines with sub-200ms latency.", tools: ["AWS IoT Core", "Timestream", "Kinesis", "Linux", "Python"], details: "Designed low-latency telemetry ingestion services for multi-sensor data in high-availability environments." }, { org: "Binghamton University", role: "MS in Computer Science", period: "Aug 2023 — May 2025", location: "New York, USA", logo: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/6/67/State_University_of_New_BT_Seal.png", url: "https://www.binghamton.edu/", impact: "Maintained a 3.9/4.0 GPA and served as a Graduate Assistant for the CS Department.", tools: ["Cloud Computing", "Data Science", "Design Patterns", "Network Security"], details: "Specialization in Systems and Data Science. Relevant coursework included large-scale distributed systems." }, { org: "LTIMindtree", role: "Software Engineer", period: "June 2021 — July 2023", location: "Mumbai, India", logo: "https://companieslogo.com/img/orig/LTIM.NS-dea59dc6.png?t=1720244492", url: "https://www.ltimindtree.com/", impact: "Achieved 65% latency reduction in financial microservices and cut defects by 25%.", tools: ["Java", "Spring Batch", "Drools", "SQL", "Power BI"], details: "Optimized large-scale financial accounting services and migrated legacy PL/SQL logic into Drools rule engines." }, { org: "University of Mumbai", role: "BE in Computer Engineering", period: "Aug 2017 — May 2021", location: "Mumbai, India", logo: "https://medcounsel.in/PG/images/1642173662.png", url: "https://mu.ac.in/", impact: "Graduated First Class with Distinction; Published Research Paper on Automated Systems.", tools: ["C++", "Java", "Python", "SQL", "Data Structures"], details: "Served as Social Media Head at Alumni Cell KJSCE and Senior Photographer for Shutterbugs." } ]; return (
{/* Reversed Schematic Accents */}

Technical Career Path

{history.map((item, index) => (
setExpandedIndex(expandedIndex === index ? null : index)} style={{ borderBottom: '1px solid rgba(107, 114, 128, 0.3)', cursor: 'pointer', background: expandedIndex === index ? '#FFFFFF' : 'transparent', padding: expandedIndex === index ? '0 20px' : '0', transition: 'all 0.3s ease' }} >

{item.role}

{item.org}
{item.period}
{item.location}
Performance Impact

{item.impact}

Technical Specs

{item.details}

Engineering Stack
{item.tools.map(tool => ( {tool} ))}
))}
); }; export default CareerBento;
